reason.zh: 平仓理由：BTC空头在低波动环境中收益有限，资金费率中性（0.0056%），未出现极端轧空信号，且宏观风险规避可能已定价。鲸鱼数据缺失，缺乏明确方向信号。
reason.en: Close reason: BTC short has limited upside in low volatility, funding is neutral (0.0056%) with no extreme squeeze signals, and macro risk-off may be priced in. Whale data is absent, lacking clear directional cues.

reason.zh: 平仓理由：鲸鱼数据显示出货信号（Token Net Flow -64万ETH），稳定币净流入，与价格下跌一致，暗示进一步下行风险。技术面RSI 46.8和负资金费率（-0.0024%）支持看跌观点。
reason.en: Close reason: Whale data shows distribution (Token Net Flow -642K ETH) with stablecoin inflow, aligning with price drop and suggesting further downside risk. Technicals (RSI 46.8, negative funding -0.0024%) support bearish view.
